Privacy & Cookie Policy Yes, I would like to receive emails with exclusive specials and offers. subscribe Get in Touch Don't Be A Stranger Be it a long-awaited reunion or a spontaneous elopement, The Loutrel serves as a gracious Southern host to your finest hour. To start planning your event, please complete and submit our online Request For Proposal, sharing a few details about the event you envision. We’ll be in touch soon to get started. Contact Details First Name * Last Name * Email Address * Phone Number * Company Name * Company Address Event Details Meeting/Event Name * Event Date Start * Event Date Finish * Number of Guestrooms * Number of Attendees Estimated Budget Please tell us more about your visit I have read and agree to the . Regarding the safety of these foods, written information is available upon request.

SKIP TO CONTENT close Email Sign Up Hidden Field Your Name Your Email I have read and agree to the . Privacy & Cookie Policy Yes, I would like to receive emails with exclusive specials and offers. subscribe Celebrate Life's Best Moments Special Event Venues In Charleston With a spectacular location, a sophisticated ambience, and sincere Southern hospitality, The Loutrel acts as a gracious host to life’s most cherished occasions. From birthday and anniversary parties to once-in-a-lifetime gatherings, our gracious Charleston event venues ensure moments that are uniquely unforgettable. Request For Proposal Weddings Elopements Intimate Weddings and Whether you’re looking for an exquisite rooftop for an intimate wedding ceremony, a perfect setting for a post-wedding brunch, or a romantic hideaway for a surprise elopement, The Loutrel provides an elegant backdrop for every aspect of your special day. Accommodations Wedding Couple Named Azalea, Camellia, and Oleander, our three light-filled Corner King Rooms that can be separated with a Lounge King, creating a private two-bedroom retreat ideal for wedding day pampering and primping. For The Group Getaways Be it a weekend getaway or a family reunion, The Loutrel offers a quintessential Charleston experience that delights at every age, from its central location to an array of complimentary signature experiences, like curated snacks and beverages and bikes for sightseeing. Request For Proposal

SKIP TO CONTENT close Email Sign Up Hidden Field Your Name Your Email I have read and agree to the . Privacy & Cookie Policy Yes, I would like to receive emails with exclusive specials and offers. subscribe Inspired Events We're in the Business of When it comes to planning corporate events, our professional staff and business-minded amenities make it easy to focus on the agenda at hand and leave the details to us. With a complimentary daily European breakfast, high-speed Wi-Fi, and one of the only-state-of-the-art fitness studios in downtown, you and your colleagues can show up refreshed and ready to orchestrate your next big idea. Request For Proposal Corporate Amenities For the Modern Traveler High-Speed Wi-Fi Throughout The Property European Breakfast Included State-Of-The-Art Fitness Studio Full Concierge Services In-Room Workspace & Televisions with HDMI, USB, RF & AV Interfaces Complimentary In-Room Beverages & Snacks Complete Meeting Packages With Curated Food & Beverage Options Talk Let's Business Corporate Travel Program High-Class Conveniences 10% off best available rate Complimentary room upgrade (based on availability) Complimentary cocktail at the Veranda Lounge Group rates available for 5+ rooms/night Request For Proposal

SKIP TO CONTENT close Email Sign Up Hidden Field Your Name Your Email I have read and agree to the . Privacy & Cookie Policy Yes, I would like to receive emails with exclusive specials and offers. subscribe Garden-Inspired Lounge Welcome to our True to the inspiration of Charleston’s celebrated private and public gardens, cherished traditions and the organic beauty of nature are blended at Veranda Lounge to create innovative libations tinged with familiarity. Tucked into the side of our elegant lobby, this is your culinary introduction to the story of Charleston, narrated through thoughtfully curated cocktail and food programs. hours OF Operations SUNDAY - THURSDAY 12:00 PM - 10:00 PM FRIDAY - SATURDAY 12:00 PM - 11:00 PM BOOK NOW VIEW MENUS Menu What We're Sipping Botanical Craft Cocktails Indulge in your favorite cocktail served with a Charleston twist and a bit of fresh perspective by one of our creative cocktail artisans. Read more What We're Eating Delectable Delicacies Craveable, bite-sized, savory flavors live here. From classic spiced nuts to exquisite tarts, discover refined accoutrements to your drink of choice. Read more The Study A Sophisticated Setting Gather your closest confidantes for a spirited experience in our private dining room. With room for up to 16 guests, this sophisticated space complements any occasion in The Loutrel’s signature style. PORCH-INSPIRED gather at our bar & lounge @VERANDALOUNGECHS expand expand expand expand

Privacy & Cookie Policy Yes, I would like to receive emails with exclusive specials and offers. subscribe Plan A Perfect Escape Charleston SC Hotel Deals Good Neighbor 10% OFF + Complimentary Valet Experience Southern hospitality with our exclusive rate for South Carolina, North Carolina, and Georgia neighbors. 10% Off Your Stay Complimentary Valet Parking ($45/night value) book now Terms & Conditions This is a limited time offer available for new reservations booked by March 19, 2026 for travel through March 19, 2026 for stays of 2 or more nights. Not applicable to groups, corporate-negotiated, or third party rates. Cannot be combined with any other promotion or offers. Subject to availability and blackout dates. Taxes and gratuities are not included. Rest, Recharge, & Rejuvenate Travel Well With The Loutrel Prioritize your well-being with The Loutrel’s wellness package, designed for deep relaxation and restful sleep. Thoughtful amenities and personalized touches ensure you wake refreshed in Charleston. book now Read More Rest, Recharge, & Rejuvenate Travel Well With The Loutrel Prioritize your well-being with The Loutrel’s wellness package, designed for deep relaxation and restful sleep. Thoughtful amenities and personalized touches ensure you wake refreshed in Charleston. Your wellness experience includes: Custom Pillow Selection – Choose from memory foam, down alternative, or goose feather options Blissy 100% Mulberry Silk Pillowcase Lavender Pillow Spray & Loutrel Sleep Mask Sound Machine with White Noise Fresh Eucalyptus Shower Enhancement Personalized Sleep & Wake Preferences – Set your ideal room temperature and wake-up time Nighttime Snack & In-Room Herbal Tea Service featuring Oliver Pluff blends *Enhance your stay with an optional Deep End exposure therapy session at Ethos Athletic Club, a guided 45-minute experience combining breathwork and cold immersion to elevate well-being. Terms and Conditions This is a limited-time offer available for new reservations. Not applicable to groups, corporate-negotiated, or third-party rates. Cannot be combined with any other promotion or offers. Package must be booked at least two weeks prior to arrival date. Minimum stay of 2 nights required. Additional cost applies for the Ethos Athletic Club's Deep End experience. book now Coastal Beach Lounging Experience Seaside Serenity Experience a day at Sullivan's Island with our beach package, thoughtfully curated to meet all your seaside needs. Relax and immerse yourself in the breathtaking beauty of our pristine coastline while we take care of the details for you! book now Read More Coastal Beach Lounging Experience Seaside Serenity Experience a day at Sullivan's Island with our beach package, thoughtfully curated to meet all your seaside needs. Our beach package includes the use of all the essentials for a day of sun-soaked relaxation. Two beach chairs Umbrella Beach towels JBL speaker Cooler with drinks + artisanal sandwiches Terms and Conditions This is a limited time offer available for new reservations only. Not applicable to groups, corporate-negotiated, or third party rates. Cannot be combined with any other promotion or offers. Subject to availability and blackout dates. Taxes and gratuities are not included. Beach transportation not included; add roundtrip service for $115 through the front desk. Package requires a 2-night minimum stay and must be booked at least one week before arrival. book now Blind Date Book Package Literary Getaway Embark on a journey of mystery, discovery, and relaxation with this exclusive experience inspired by the allure of "blind date" books. Choose from curated genres like historic fiction, romance, cooking, and culture & art. Book now Read More Blind Date Book Package Literary Getaway Embark on a literary journey of mystery, discovery, and relaxation with The Loutrel and Buxton Books. Choose from curated genres like historic fiction, romance, cooking, and culture & art. Package Includes: A surprise “blind date” book based on your preferred genre A curated itinerary tailored to the theme of the book, suggesting related spots for exploration A visit to Buxton Books to explore their extensive collection and perhaps discover your next favorite read A round of botanical-inspired cocktails at Veranda Lounge Terms and Conditions This is a limited-time offer available for new reservations booked for travel through December 31, 2025. Not applicable to groups, corporate-negotiated, or third-party rates. Cannot be combined with any other promotion or offers. Package must be booked at least two weeks prior to arrival date. Minimum stay of 2 nights required. Additional costs may apply for suggested items on the itinerary and is not included in the package price. Book now BE YOUR BEST SELF Reinvigorate with a Massage + More Enjoy a soothing massage from the comfort of your room and take advantage of our state-of-the-art fitness amenities that includes Peloton and Precor equipment, plus complimentary bicycles for exploring the city. book now Read More BE YOUR BEST SELF Reinvigorate with a Massage + More Enjoy a soothing massage from the comfort of your room and take advantage of our state-of-the-art fitness amenities. Package includes: In-room 60-minute massage with Charleston Mobile Massage Fresh fruit and infused water Terms and Conditions Not applicable to groups, corporate-negotiated, or third party rates. Cannot be combined with any other package, promotion or discount. Subject to availability and blackout dates. Taxes and gratuities are not included. This is a limited time offer that requires a two-night minimum stay. book now A CHARLESTON CELEBRATION Enjoy with Charleston's Finest Treats Commemorate your moments, both brief and extended, at The Loutrel with a few high-touch treats that inspire even more delight, including a petite cake, bottle of Prosecco and a fresh garden floral bouquet. book now Read More A CHARLESTON CELEBRATION Enjoy with Charleston's Finest Treats Enjoy some of Charleston's favorite treats and commemorate all the best memories made here. Package Includes: Petite Cake Bottle of Prosecco Fresh Garden Floral Bouquet Terms and Conditions Not applicable to groups, corporate-negotiated, or third party rates. Cannot be combined with any other package, promotion or discount. Subject to availability and blackout dates. Taxes and gratuities are not included. This is a limited time offer that requires a two-night minimum stay. book now Love in the Lowcountry Exclusive Romantic Experience Elevate your date night with exclusive access to one of Charleston's premier rooftop terraces that offers breathtaking views of the historic French Quarter. book now Read More Love in the Lowcountry Exclusive Romantic Experience Elevate your date night with exclusive access to one of Charleston's premier rooftop terraces. Package includes: Specialty cocktails for two paired with a custom charcuterie board, complete with tasty treats, including strawberries and chocolates by Charleston Chocolatier Petite floral arrangement A custom scented Candlefish candle Matouk blanket, a guest favorite Terms and Conditions This is a limited time offer that requires a two-night minimum stay. Not applicable to groups, corporate-negotiated, or third party rates. Cannot be combined with any other promotion or offers. Subject to availability and blackout dates. Taxes and gratuities are not included. book now sets us what Apart Centrally Located In The Heart of Historic Charleston Step out our front doors into the heart of historic Charleston where cherished Colonial mansions, cobblestone streets, and the trendy boutiques of King Street lay at your feet. All-Inclusive Clubroom Leave the lobby for a more intimate atmosphere at our exclusive social club on the Mezzanine level, serving complimentary sips and small plates. Rooftop Terrace Welcome to a refreshing vantage point overlooking the city on our expansive Rooftop Terrace, ornamented with verdant greenery and open-air seating. Fitness Studio Set yourself in motion in our modern fitness studio, equipped with everything you need for an active stay in Charleston. From a full range of strength training machines to a Peloton bike—come sweat it out in one of the only state-of-the-art fitness studios in downtown. Veranda Lounge Pull up a seat and begin a rapport with our jovial mixologists while they concoct a drink from our signature menu. Tucked into the side of our lobby, Veranda Lounge is a place to see and be seen

SKIP TO CONTENT close Email Sign Up Hidden Field Your Name Your Email I have read and agree to the . Privacy & Cookie Policy Yes, I would like to receive emails with exclusive specials and offers. subscribe To Your Finest Hour Let us play host Against the backdrop of Charleston’s historic district, hosting sophisticated events comes as second nature to us. Pair an iconic location with one of our four distinct Charleston event spaces and you have the makings of an exquisite affair that captures the true spirit of the city and leaves a lasting impression on your guests. Request For Proposal The Highlights Unforgettable Events High-Speed Wi-Fi Throughout The Property Four Distinct Venue Options Complete Meeting Packages With Curated Food & Beverage Options Evening Reception With A Selection Of Food & Drinks State-Of-The-Art Fitness Studio Local Off-Site Catering Options Spaces Event to Inspire Rooftop Terrace Picturesque Views An unforgettable event deserves an unforgettable view to match. Overlooking Market Street and the colorful facades of the French Quarter, this expansive rooftop terrace offers plenty of open-air seatings in a refreshingly contemporary setting. Veranda Lounge Libations & Small Plates Perfect for private cocktails hours and mixers, Veranda Lounge is a place to see and be seen. Sit around our sit around our bar and dining space then swap stories and share city secrets over can’t-miss libations and small plates. The Clubroom All-Inclusive The Loutrel's exclusive Clubroom on the Mezzanne level offers 700 sq. feet of flexible event space. The Study Private Dining Gather your closest confidantes for a spirited experience in our private dining room. With room for up to 16 guests, this sophisticated space complements any occasion in The Loutrel’s signature style.
